title: crashing
body:
recently my game has started to crash alot and when i try to reconnect back in to game i'm unable to connect back,i can only connect back when everyone is ingame.I think someone might have posted about this before and i know for sure that this is not happening to me only.Any tips on how to fix this because it's pretty annoying if you play shaco and your blue or red buff has already spawned.
thank you for the feedback :){{champion:105}}

replies.body: Hi im playing ranked right now and, i have had 7 dcs withing 25 min, and therefor im going fucking 1-8-5 , and geting reported for "inting". i hope riot will remove this match since i lost lp thx to a bug.... i have never had any of these problmes before......... until i downloaded this update.....

I don't have a lot of visibility over EU issues, but I don't see anything out of the ordinary.  If you've been crashing a lot then your connection might be having problems reaching the game server.  Download our [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to the EUNE game server 31.186.224.42.  Run it for about 5 minutes and post your results so we can see if your ISP is having any bumps getting to us.
